title: Creative Filters
description: Filter criteria for querying creative assets from the centralized library. By default, archived creatives are excluded from results. To include archived creatives, explicitly filter by status='archived' or include 'archived' in the statuses array.

accounts.description: Filter creatives by owning accounts. Useful for agencies managing multiple client accounts.

formats.description: Filter by creative format types (e.g., video, audio, display)

tags.description: Filter by creative tags (all tags must match)

tags_any.description: Filter by creative tags (any tag must match)

name_contains.description: Filter by creative names containing this text (case-insensitive)

created_after.description: Filter creatives created after this date (ISO 8601)

created_before.description: Filter creatives created before this date (ISO 8601)

updated_after.description: Filter creatives last updated after this date (ISO 8601)

updated_before.description: Filter creatives last updated before this date (ISO 8601)

assigned_to_packages.description: Filter creatives assigned to any of these packages

media_buy_ids.description: Filter creatives assigned to any of these media buys

buyer_refs.description: Filter creatives assigned to media buys with any of these buyer references

unassigned.description: Filter for unassigned creatives when true, assigned creatives when false

has_performance_data.description: Filter creatives that have performance data when true
